subject: Writing
title: Social Proof: Everyone Else Is Doing It
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Social Proof: Everyone Else Is Doing It.

hook.text: 'Nine out of ten dentists recommend...' You've never questioned it. That's social proof in action.

buildup.text: Social proof is the psychological principle that we look to others' behavior to guide our own decisions.

discovery.text: Robert Cialdini identified social proof as one of six key principles of persuasion in his 1984 book Influence.

twist.text: Online reviews weaponize social proof ‚Äî fake reviews are a billion-dollar industry because social proof works so well.

climax.text: We evolved to follow the crowd for survival. Marketers exploit this instinct every time you see a star rating.

punchline.text: We trust strangers' opinions more than our own judgment.

quiz.question: Who identified social proof as a key persuasion principle?
